verses.verse: וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you שָׂ֣א <WH5375> Moreover take thou up קִינָ֔ה <WH7015> a lamentation אֶל־ <WH413> for נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <WH5387> for the princes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> And say מָ֤ה <WH4100> What אִמְּךָ֙ <WH517> your mother לְבִיָּ֔א <WH3833> great בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among אֲרָי֖וֹת <WH738> among lions רָבָ֑צָה <WH7257> she lay down בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among כְּפִרִ֖ים <WH3715> young lions רִבְּתָ֥ה <WH7235> she nourished גוּרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1482> her whelps

וַתַּ֛עַל <WH5927> And she brought up אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one מִגֻּרֶ֖יהָ <WH1482> of her whelps כְּפִ֣יר <WH3715> it became a young lion הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> became וַיִּלְמַ֥ד <WH3925> and it learned לִטְרָף־ <WH2963> to catch טֶ֖רֶף <WH2964> the prey אָדָ֥ם <WH120> men אָכָֽל׃ <WH398> it devoured

וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> also heard אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> The nations בְּשַׁחְתָּ֣ם <WH7845> in their pit נִתְפָּ֑שׂ <WH8610> of him he was taken וַיְבִאֻ֥הוּ <WH935> and they brought בַֽחַחִ֖ים <WH2397> him with chains אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> unto the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> Now when she saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נֽוֹחֲלָ֔ה <WH3176> that she had waited אָבְדָ֖ה <WH6> was lost תִּקְוָתָ֑הּ <WH8615> [and] her hope וַתִּקַּ֛ח <WH3947> then she took אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> another מִגֻּרֶ֖יהָ <WH1482> of her whelps כְּפִ֥יר <WH3715> him a young lion שָׂמָֽתְהוּ׃ <WH7760> [and] made

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> And he went up and down בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> among אֲרָי֖וֹת <WH738> the lions כְּפִ֣יר <WH3715> he became a young lion הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> became וַיִּלְמַ֥ד <WH3925> and learned לִטְרָף־ <WH2963> to catch טֶ֖רֶף <WH2964> the prey אָדָ֥ם <WH120> men אָכָֽל׃ <WH398> [and] devoured

וַיֵּ֙דַע֙ <WH3045> And he knew אַלְמְנוֹתָ֔יו <WH490> their desolate palaces וְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> their cities הֶחֱרִ֑יב <WH2717> and he laid waste וַתֵּ֤שַׁם <WH3456> was desolate אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the land וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> and the fulness מִקּ֖וֹל <WH6963> thereof by the noise שַׁאֲגָתֽוֹ׃ <WH7581> of his roaring

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> set עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> against גּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> Then the nations סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> against him on every side מִמְּדִינ֑וֹת <WH4082> from the provinces וַֽיִּפְרְשׂ֥וּ <WH6566> and spread עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> over רִשְׁתָּ֖ם <WH7568> their net בְּשַׁחְתָּ֥ם <WH7845> in their pit נִתְפָּֽשׂ׃ <WH8610> over him he was taken

וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֤הוּ <WH5414> And they put בַסּוּגַר֙ <WH5474> him in ward בַּֽחַחִ֔ים <WH2397> in chains וַיְבִאֻ֖הוּ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> him to the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon יְבִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH935> they brought בַּמְּצֹד֔וֹת <WH4686> castle לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> So לֹא־ <WH3808> no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> should no more be heard קוֹל֛וֹ <WH6963> that his voice ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more אֶל־ <WH413> on הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

אִמְּךָ֥ <WH517> Thy mother כַגֶּ֛פֶן <WH1612> [is] like a vine בְּדָמְךָ֖ <WH1818> bloodshed עַל־ <WH5921> by מַ֣יִם <WH4325> by the waters שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <WH8362> planted פֹּֽרִיָּה֙ <WH6509> she was fruitful וַֽעֲנֵפָ֔ה <WH6058> and full of branches הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> become מִמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> by reason of many

וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> had לָ֞הּ מַטּ֣וֹת <WH4294> rods עֹ֗ז <WH5797> And she had strong אֶל־ <WH413> to שִׁבְטֵי֙ <WH7626> for the sceptres מֹֽשְׁלִ֔ים <WH4910> of them that bare rule וַתִּגְבַּ֥הּ <WH1361> was exalted קֽוֹמָת֖וֹ <WH6967> and her stature עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among עֲבֹתִ֑ים <WH5688> among the thick branches וַיֵּרָ֣א <WH7200> and she appeared בְגָבְה֔וֹ <WH1363> in her height בְּרֹ֖ב <WH7230> with the multitude דָּלִיֹּתָֽיו׃ <WH1808> of her branches

וַתֻּתַּ֤שׁ <WH5428> But she was plucked up בְּחֵמָה֙ <WH2534> in fury לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> to the ground הֻשְׁלָ֔כָה <WH7993> she was cast down וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> wind הַקָּדִ֖ים <WH6921> and the east הוֹבִ֣ישׁ <WH3001> dried up פִּרְיָ֑הּ <WH6529> her fruit הִתְפָּרְק֧וּ <WH6561> were broken וְיָבֵ֛שׁוּ <WH3001> and withered מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> rods עֻזָּ֖הּ <WH5797> her strong אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> the fire אֲכָלָֽתְהוּ׃ <WH398> consumed
וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> and now שְׁתוּלָ֣ה <WH8362> And now she [is] planted בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> ground צִיָּ֥ה <WH6723> in a dry וְצָמָֽא׃ <WH6772> and thirsty

וַתֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> is gone out אֵ֜שׁ <WH784> And fire מִמַּטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> of a rod בַדֶּ֙יהָ֙ <WH905> of her branches פִּרְיָ֣הּ <WH6529> her fruit אָכָ֔לָה <WH398> [which] hath devoured וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and has הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become בָ֛הּ מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> rod עֹ֖ז <WH5797> so that she hath no strong שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> [to be] a sceptre לִמְשׁ֑וֹל <WH4910> to rule קִ֥ינָה <WH7015> This [is] a lamentation הִ֖יא <WH1931> he וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become לְקִינָֽה׃ <WH7015> and shall be for a lamentation פ
